trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示一套<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The GridTableStylesCollection contains <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects that allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control to display a customized grid style for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: GridTableStylesCollection 包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>允许<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>控件来显示每个<xref:System.Data.DataTable><xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>中</xref:System.Data.DataTable>的自定义的网格样式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>的对象</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property returns the GridTableStylesCollection.
By default, the GridTableStylesCollection does not contain any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GridTableStylesCollection 不包含任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> displays each table using default settings for color, width, and formatting.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>显示使用默认设置进行颜色、 宽度和格式设置每个表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: All columns of each table are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 将显示每个表的所有列。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is added to the collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to determine which object supplies the data for the grid.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>添加到集合，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>来确定哪些对象提供的数据网格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> must match the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of one of the objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果数据源是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，其中包含三个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>必须匹配<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的其中一个对象。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> does not match any of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> values, the default settings will be used to display data for each table, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> settings will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的任何不匹配<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>值，则默认的设置将用于显示的每个表的数据和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>设置将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the GridTableStylesCollection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 始终创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>之前添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>GridTableStylesCollection 到的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 当你将添加一个空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>使用一个有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>到集合中，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自动为你生成的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象的重复<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>因此，将引发异常

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Clear%2A> method.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to this collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the newly added object.
Adds an array of table styles to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将一个表样式数组添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> objects.
Clears the collection.
Occurs when the collection has changed.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref> contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> specified by name.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>由名称指定。

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified table style exists in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的表样式集合; 中存在否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref>包含指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to look for.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified table style exists in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的表样式集合; 中存在否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> specified by index.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add items to the collection.
The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to get.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> at the specified index.
No item exists at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处不存在任何项。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> with the specified name.

When retrieving a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property uses a case-insensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 检索时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>属性使用不区分大小写的比较。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add items to the collection.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to retrieve.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName*>.
Gets the underlying list.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that contains the table data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> containing the event data.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> exists before using the Remove method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法来确定是否为特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>使用删除方法之前已存在。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to remove.
Removes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> at the specified index.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> exists before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A>方法来确定是否为特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>使用之前已存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to remove.
Copies the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 将集合复制到兼容的一维<xref:System.Array>，从目标数组的指定索引处开始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一维<xref:System.Array>是从集合中复制的元素的目标。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 该数组必须具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 复制即数组中从零开始的索引开始。

trans-unit.source: array is null.
index is less than zero.
array is multidimensional.
-or- The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref> is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: -中的元素数<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref>大于从索引到目标数组末尾的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The type in the collection cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的类型无法自动转换为目标数组的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中包含的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否访问<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref>是同步的 （线程安全）。

trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> used to synchronize access to the collection.
Returns an enumerator for the collection.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the collection.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to this collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the newly added object.
value cannot be cast to a .
value has already been assigned to a .
-or- A in has the same property value as value.
Clears the collection.
Determines whether an element is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定某元素是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中定位的对象。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回集合中指定的对象的第一个匹配项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中定位的对象。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the entire collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 在整个集合中的值的第一个匹配项的从零开始索引如果找到了;否则为-1。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList.Insert*> method.
Always throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
You cannot insert an item into the middle of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你无法将项插入到集合的中间。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the collection.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，应在此处插入值。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the collection.
Always thrown.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合是否具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定索引处的元素。

The element at the specified index.
The item property cannot be set.

value cannot be cast to a .
